title: Age of Wonders 4 - Official Story Trailer
description:
Watch the latest trailer for Age of Wonders 4 to learn more about the story and the return of the Wizard Kings in this upcoming fantasy strategy game. Age of Wonders 4 will be available on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X and S on May 2, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Fortnite - Official Adonis Creed Trailer
description:
Check out the trailer to see the reveal that Adonis Creed makes his way into Fortnite. Adonis Creed's outfit will be available in the item shop starting today, March 2, 2023, at 7 p.m. ET. 

Finish off Battle Royale Chapter 4 Season 1 with a knockout punch. Boxing prodigy Adonis Creed takes his best shot inside Fortnite.

#IGN #Gaming #Fortnite

title: Sons of the Forest: Essential Tips For Building Your First Base
description:
Crafting reliable structures is essential to your survival in Sons of the Forest. Even if you're diving into this open-world horror title as a seasoned veteran, there are some major changes to construction in this open-world horror title worth knowing. Check out our handy video to get a grasp on how the new and improved building system works in Sons of the Forest. 

00:00 - Intro 
00:18 - Sons of the Forest Building Overview 
01:22 - How to Build Floors 
02:25 - How to Build Walls 
02:47 - How to Build Ceilings
03:29 - How to Build Stairs 
04:33 - How to Build Defensive Walls 
05:10 - Put Kelvin to Work 
05:35 - Outro

#IGN #Gaming #SonsOfTheForest

title: Ruined King: A League of Legends Story - Official Next Gen Trailer
description:
Ruined King: A League of Legends Story is a single-player turn-based RPG set in the world of League of Legends. The next-gen edition brings the game native to PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X in 4K 60FPS while also offering a free upgrade to initial PlayStation 4 and Xbox One owners. Ruined King: A League of Legends Story next-gen edition is available now on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X.

#IGN #Gaming

title: John Wick: Chapter 4 - Official Clip (2023) Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne
description:
John gets a new suit in this clip from John Wick: Chapter 4, the upcoming movie starring Keanu Reeves, Donnie Yen, Bill Skarsgård, Laurence Fishburne, Hiroyuki Sanada, Shamier Anderson, Lance Reddick, Rina Sawayama, Scott Adkins, and Ian McShane.

John Wick (Keanu Reeves) uncovers a path to defeating the High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

John Wick: Chapter 4 opens in in theaters and IMAX on March 24, 2023.

description:

title: The Mandalorian - Official Teaser Trailer (2023) Pedro Pascal, Katee Sackhoff
description:
The journey continues. Watch the latest teaser for the new season of The Mandalorian. The series stars Pedro Pascal, Katee Sackhoff, Carl Weathers, Amy Sedaris, Emily Swallow, and Giancarlo Esposito.

#IGN #StarWars #TheMandalorian

title: Sons of the Forest Early Access Review
description:
Sons of the Forest early access reviewed by Leana Hafer on PC.

This sequel to The Forest takes everything its predecessor did well and does it a little bit better. Exploring a huge, beautiful, deadly island through the changing seasons is a treat on its own. The new base building mechanics could entertain me for days without ever touching the main story. And to top it all off, we have smarter and more unsettling enemy behavior paired with thoughtfully improved combat. It's already great, and it's still in Early Access. With some healthy performance optimization and shining up of an impactful but sloppy ending, it could become incredible.

#IGN #Gaming

title: John Wick: Chapter 4 - Official Clip (2023) Keanu Reeves, Bill Skarsgård
description:
Some rules are laid out in this clip from John Wick: Chapter 4, the upcoming movie starring Keanu Reeves, Donnie Yen, Bill Skarsgård, Laurence Fishburne, Hiroyuki Sanada, Shamier Anderson, Lance Reddick, Rina Sawayama, Scott Adkins, and Ian McShane.

John Wick (Keanu Reeves) uncovers a path to defeating the High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

title: Haunted Mansion - Official Teaser Trailer (2023) Owen Wilson, Danny DeVito, Rosario Dawson
description:
Check out the teaser trailer for Haunted Mansion, an upcoming movie starring LaKeith Stanfield, Tiffany Haddish, Owen Wilson, Danny DeVito, Rosario Dawson, Chase W. Dillon and Dan Levy, with Jamie Lee Curtis and Jared Leto as The Hatbox Ghost.

Inspired by the classic theme park attraction, Haunted Mansion is about a woman and her son who enlist a motley crew of so-called spiritual experts to help rid their home of supernatural squatters. The film’s producers are Dan Lin and  Jonathan Eirich, with Nick Reynolds and Tom Peitzman serving as executive producers.

Haunted Mansion will open in theaters on July 28, 2023.

title: Dead Island 2 - Official Extended Gameplay Trailer
description:
An extended look at some new Dead Island 2 gameplay has been revealed. Follow our Slayer, Dani, through the streets of Beverly Hills and Bel-Air as she tests new weapons, shows off powerful skills like ground pounds, and more. Dead Island 2 launches on April 21 for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #DeadIsland2

title: Age of  Wonders 4:  The First Preview of This Wild 4X Game
description:
As we found out in our first hands-on preview of Age of Wonders 4, you can create all sorts of sci-fi oddities and see how they clash with each other. Previewed on PC by Leana Hafer.

#IGN #Gaming

title: The Best Man - Official Exclusive Trailer (2023) Dolph Lundgren, Luke Wilson
description: Luke Wilson and Dolph Lundgren star in this pulse-pounding, action-packed thriller. When a team of ruthless mercenaries violently seize control of a remote resort hotel, former Special Ops soldiers attending their best friend's wedding must rely only on their wits and training to combat the terrorists and save the hostages held for ransom. The cast also includes Brendan Fehr, Nicky Whelan, Scout Taylor-Compton, and Scott Martin. The Best Man opens April 21, 2023, in theatres, On digita,l and On Demand.

title: Apex Legends - Official Imperial Guard Collection Event Trailer
description:
Watch the latest Apex Legends trailer to see what to expect with the Imperial Guard Collection event, featuring Mixtape, a permanent playlist featuring a rotation of Team Deathmatch, Control, and Gun Run. 

During the event, unlock 24 limited-time cosmetics, with Legendary skins for Wraith, Revenant, Octane, and more. Unlocking all 23 cosmetics before the event ends will net you Wraith’s “Hope’s Dawn” Heirloom. Additional items can be earned with the event's rewards track. 

Apex Legends' Imperial Guard Collection event runs from March 7 through March 21, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming #ApexLegends

title: Dragonheir: Silent Gods - Official Announcement Trailer
description: Welcome to the world of Dragonheir: Silent Gods, an open-world high-fantasy RPG that puts you in control of over 200 heroes. In this game, you'll experience strategic combat like never before, where every move counts and every decision could be the difference between victory and defeat. With rolling dice and seasonal multiversal content, Dragonheir keeps things fresh and exciting, offering endless possibilities for adventure and exploration. Whether you're an open-world RPG player or new to the genre, Dragonheir: Silent Gods is sure to provide an unforgettable gaming experience. Pre-register now:  http://dragonheir.nvsgames.com/?utm_source=IGN

title: Resident Evil 4 Remake: 8 Exciting New Details
description:
Check out these exciting new Resident Evil 4 Remake details! RE4 Remake is just a few weeks away but IGN got one more look at the highly-anticipated survival horror game ahead of the launch, with plenty of enticing new details to pore over. While we would have preferred to actually play the game, especially since it’s so close to release, instead we were shown just under 20 minutes of new Resident Evil 4 Remake gameplay. However, this new RE4 Remake gameplay gave us enough of a look to spot some of what we think will be the biggest RE4 Remake changes coming to the horror classic.

#IGN #Gaming #ResidentEvil

title: Resident Evil 4: Salazar and Krauser Scene Comparison
description:
Check out this Resident Evil 4 original vs RE4 Remake gameplay comparison video, featuring some new RE4 Remake gameplay! How much has Resident Evil 4 changed in the upcoming remake? We compare scenes with Resident Evil 4 Remake Salazar and Krauser to the original Resident Evil 4 to see what's changed and what's been faithfully recreated.

The Resident Evil 4 Remake release date is March 24, 2023 and the game is coming to PC, PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and PS4.

#IGN #Gaming #ResidentEvil

title: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe - Official Booster Course Pass Wave 4 Release Date Trailer
description:
Mario Kart 8 Deluxe: Booster Course Pass Wave 4 will be available on March 9, 2023. Watch the trailer to see the courses in Wave 4 of the Mario Kart 8 Deluxe Booster Course Pass, including Tour Amsterdam Drift, GBA Riverside Park, Wii DK Summit, Yoshi’s Island, Tour Bangkok Rush, DS Mario Circuit, GCN Waluigi Stadium, and Tour Singapore Speedway. Birdo also arrives as part of the Booster Course Pass Wave 4 as a new playable character.

#IGN #Gaming #MarioKart

title: Three Reasons PSVR2 Is Better Than Meta Quest 2
description: Akeem has had tons of time with the PSVR 2, and as one of the biggest VR enthusiasts at IGN, he's got words on why he thinks PSVR 2 is actually better than the Meta Quest 2! From Horizon: Call of the Mountain to Resident Evil Village VR, to hardware specific features, he's found tons to love about the PSVR 2 and we're here for it! Are you still on the fence?

title: The Thaumaturge - Official Gameplay Trailer
description:
Here's your look at gameplay in this latest trailer for The Thaumaturge, an upcoming isometric story-driven RPG from 11 bit studios.

The Thaumaturge is a story-driven RPG with morally ambiguous choices taking place in the culturally diverse world of early 20th-century Warsaw. In this world, Salutors exist: esoteric beings that only Thaumaturges can truly perceive and use to their needs.

title: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty Review
description:
Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty reviewed by Mitchell Saltzman on PlayStation 5. Also available on PlayStation 4, Xbox, and PC.

"Familiar issues with storytelling and loot aside, Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty is another great entry in Team Ninja's growing collection of action RPGs that features some of the best combat in the soulslike genre, even though those battles start to lose their tension due to a distinct lack of variety to fill out the 20+ hour runtime."

title: The Tutor - Official Trailer (2023) Noah Schnapp, Garrett Hedlund
description:
An in-demand tutor for the East Coast monied elite, Ethan (Garrett Hedlund) lands a high-paying assignment to instruct a billionaire’s son, Jackson (Noah Schnapp), at a remote New York waterfront estate. Almost immediately, Ethan realizes that his student’s interest in his life borders upon obsession. As tension grows, Jackson’s accusations threaten to expose Ethan’s perceived dark secrets to his girlfriend (Victoria Justice) and the authorities.  As sentiment turns against Ethan, it is up to him, and only him, to unearth Jackson’s accusations and prove his innocence.

#IGN

title: AGENT ELVIS - Official Trailer (2023) Matthew McConaughey, Johnny Knoxville, Don Cheadle
description:
Elvis Presley trades in his jumpsuit for a jet pack when he is covertly inducted into a secret government spy program to battle the dark forces that threaten the country he loves – all while holding down his day job as the King Of Rock And Roll.

#IGN

title: Ultimate Sackboy - Official Trailer
description: Ultimate Sackboy is a mobile free-to-play time-based running game that gives fans of LittleBigPlanet the chance to take on Craftworld's new and crazy obstacle racing tournament. Beat familiar enemies in head-to-head challenges to win gold, prizes, and competitors' outfits. Ultimate Sackboy is available now on iOS and Android.

title: You Can't Buy This Mandalorian-Themed Xbox Series X - IGN Daily Fix
description:
In today's Daily Fix:

Microsoft and Lucasfilm have teamed up to create a cool-looking Mandalorian-themed Xbox Series X and Series S, along with a Grogu-colored controller and matching hoodie. The Xbox Series X has a Mando stencil, while the smaller Series S is appropriately Grogu-themed. Unfortunately you can't buy these—the consoles are available only via a Twitter contest, so good luck if you're entering. And speaking of Twitter, Hideo Kojima tweeted some photos of a meeting he had with an Xbox exec and his team at Kojima's studio. It's been known that Microsoft and Kojima Productions are teaming up for a game, so maybe this meeting is related to that? And judging by the food pics he tweeted, maybe it's food themed? Metal Gear Salad? Solid Steak? And finally, we take a look at some of the new powers coming to Destiny 2: Lightfall.

#IGN #Gaming

title: MCU Writer Might've Just Confirmed These Heroes Avengers 5 Appearances - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
description: We might know a few #MCU heroes that’re set to appear in Avengers: The Kang Dynasty. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania screenwriter, Jeff Loveness, teased a few Disney Plus heroes might be coming to the big screen. Should we expect to see Hawkeye, Daredevil and Moon Knight in #Avengers5? In other news, the writer for Ant-Man 3 is upset with reviews of the movie, and the Mario movie is coming sooner than expected.

title: Diablo 4 - Official Beta Early Access Gameplay Trailer
description:
Check out the latest trailer for Diablo IV. Get ready to descend into Hell early March 17 – 19 during the Diablo IV Beta Early Access weekend.

Diablo IV is available on June 6, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming
